ygData.subject: Re: Plague alert

Katya stops for a moment. She takes a deep breath in and lets it out.

Katya: Simple enough, but risky. Vlad, Ragnar and I are humans stuck
in mech shells. If the shell dissolves, then the human stays, quiaff?
My idea would be to expose us three to the Plague and to isolate us in
a plastic container. This way, we gain our human forms back and you
are not harmed. The risky part is that I do not know how much we are
fused with the mech bodies.

Yggdrasil: That is crazy! I will not allow you or any other to put
their life in the line of such a disease! What if you are much more
fused than you think? No, I disagree.

Katya turns to Kup, her eyes almost begging him.

Katya: What do you think Kup?

: : Kup : : 

Kup turns to face Katya. 

Kup: What? How? 

: : Rodimus Prime : : 

Just then, Rodimus comes in. What's the situation? Are we safe? 

 Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: 

Yggdrasil turns wearily. He had heard every bit of the conversation
and he was not very enthusiastic either about it.
 
Yggdrasil: The first thing we could try is to coat ourselves to
protect us from that Plague. Some sort of Anti-rust. I want someone to
check the databanks to know how the Autobots and Decepticons were
affected and how they overcame it. If Wheeljack can, let him develop a
vaccine. And Kup, send someone to get Rodimus. He is in the cargo bay
looking for a pod, if I'm right.
 
Katya entered the office at the same moment.
 
Katya: Wait! That disease you speak of could be our salvation! At
least, it could be for Ragnar me and Vlad...
 
: : Kup : : 

Kup looks out and sees the rusty haze for himself. 

Kup: Oh slag! Of all the damn things to happen... 

Kup slams his fist into a near by computer terminal, putting the ship
on red alert. The alarms sound as the ship seals off, and the
deflector shields activate. 

He then opens a comm to every Maximal in the base. 

Kup: This is security chief Kup. We have reason to believe that a very
infections and lethal plague is airborn and heading this way. If you
are infected you will not notice symptoms at first, but will later
encounter small glitches, and eventually decay of rust. Do not leave
the base untill informed otherwise. 

Kup runs for the Commanders office. 

Kup: Come with me Aerotaur. I guess the attack on the Predacons that
Katya and I were planning will be delayed even more. 

He reaches the office and finds only Yggdrasil inside. 

Kup: Commander, I'm sure you heard my report over the comm. I'm not
sure what to do. And where is Rodimus Prime?
